name: AHA Exfoliating Cream
superIngr: Organic Green Tea Leaf and Organic Bilberry Fruit Extracts
Organic Shea Butter and Mango Butter
prodHighlight: Suitable for more sensitive skin while still providing both chemical and physical exfoliation.
Worry-free Jojoba Wax Beads eliminate the need for environmentally damaging plastic microbeads; more Jojoba Beads can be added to suit customer needs.
The cream base leaves skin more hydrated and feeling softer than an exfoliator alone.
Alpha Hydroxy Acids (AHAs) provide chemical exfoliation with the inclusion of Glycolic, Tartaric, and Malic Acids.
Match with other gentle chemical exfoliators to complete a once-weekly routine.
skinType: Suitable for all skin types.
warnings: For external use only. Do not ingest. Avoid contact with eyes. Flush eyes thoroughly with water if contact occurs. Keep out of reach of children. Discontinue use if signs of irritation or rash appear. Pregnant or lactating people or those with known medical conditions should consult with a physician prior to using product.
prodDesc: Apply a dab of cream on damp skin. Uniformly massage into your skin, paying close attention to areas of congestion or dryness. Moisten fingertips with warm water and massage again. Rinse with warm water until all product is removed and pat dry. Use 1-2 times per week. External use only.
prodDirec: Apply a dab of cream on damp skin. Uniformly massage into your skin, paying close attention to areas of congestion or dryness. Moisten fingertips with warm water and massage again. Rinse with warm water until all product is removed and pat dry. Use 1-2 times per week. External use only.
prodIngr: Organic Aloe Leaf Juice (Aloe Barbadensis), Organic Palm Fruit Oil (Elaeis Guineensis), Jojoba Esters (Hydrogenated Simmondsia Chinensis Oil), Apricot Kernel Oil (Prunus Armeniaca), Emulsifying Wax (Cetyl Alcohol, Stearyl Alcohol, Polysorbate 60), Stearic Acid, Glycerin, Vitamin E (Tocopherol), Sunflower Seed Oil (Helianthus Annuus), Phenoxyethanol, Organic Green Tea Leaf Extract (Camellia Sinensis), Organic Sugar Cane Extract (Saccharum Officinarum), Organic Bilberry Fruit Extract (Vaccinium Myrtillus), Organic Sugar Maple Extract (Acer Saccharinum), Organic Orange Peel Extract (Citrus Sinensis), Organic Lemon Peel Extract (Citrus Limon), Organic Cranberry Fruit Extract (Vaccinium Macrocarpon), Glycolic Acid, Tartaric Acid, Malic Acid, Mango Seed Butter (Mangifera Indica), Organic Shea Butter (Butyrospermum Parkii), Organic White Willow Bark Extract (Salix Alba), Organic Neem Seed Oil (Melia Azadirachta), Organic Rosemary Leaf Extract (Rosmarinus Officinalis), Organic Sunflower Seed Oil (Helianthus Annuus), Organic Alcohol, Xanthan Gum, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate
reviews: Shay

The AHA Cream has been a wonderful product for my sensitive, combination skin. It has a very mild scent and removes dead skin while also hydrating so that there is no dryness or irritation, unlike many other facial exfoliants I’ve tried!
Great for sensitive skin
Need Name

This helped clear up my acne! It is great to get rid of the dry peeling that comes with acne and breakouts. It is very gentle and not harsh at all, not stripping my skin which is important as someone who has acne!
Helped clear up my acne. Very gentle for my skin.

name: AHA Facial Toner
superIngr: Malic Acid, Tartaric Acid, Glycolic Acid, and Lactic Acid
Organic Bilberry, Orange & Lemon Peel, and Cranberry Extracts
prodHighlight: Formulated to help soften and smooth the appearance of the skin while restoring balance.
Contains an effective concentration of alpha hydroxy acids including Malic Acid, Tartaric Acid, Glycolic Acid, Lactic Acid, and Citric Acid.
Includes cleansing Tea Tree Essential Oil to assist troubled complexions.
Helps to minimize the appearance of pores while removing residue left behind after cleansing.
May not be suitable for hyper-sensitive skin due to AHA concentrations.
skinType: Suitable for all skin types, especially, oily, combination, acne and sensitive.
warnings:
For external use only. Do not ingest. Avoid contact with eyes. Flush eyes thoroughly with water if contact occurs. Keep out of reach of children. Discontinue use if signs of irritation or rash appear. Pregnant or lactating people or those with known medical conditions should consult with a physician prior to using product. 
 Sunburn Alert: This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin’s sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterward.
prodDesc: This facial toner is formulated with powerful alpha hydroxy acids and cleansing tea tree oil to help soften and smooth the skin and minimize the appearance of pores while removing any residue left behind after cleansing.
prodDirec: After cleansing the face, apply a moderate amount of toner to a cotton pad and gently apply all over the face in upward motions. Allow to dry and follow with NuVitta serum or moisturizer. For optimal results, use morning and evening. May not be suitable for hyper-sensitive skin due to AHA concentrations. External use only.
prodIngr: Organic Aloe Leaf Juice (Aloe Barbadensis), Glycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Organic Sugar Cane Extract (Saccharum Officinarum), Organic Bilberry Fruit Extract (Vaccinium Myrtillus), Organic Sugar Maple Extract (Acer Saccharinum), Organic Orange Peel Extract (Citrus Sinensis), Organic Lemon Peel Extract (Citrus Limon), Organic Cranberry Fruit Extract (Vaccinium Macrocarpon), Malic Acid, Tartaric Acid, Glycolic Acid, Lactic Acid, Citric Acid, Organic White Willow Bark Extract (Salix Alba), Tea Tree Leaf Oil (Melaleuca Alternifolia), Polysorbate 20, Organic Alcohol, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate
reviews: Need Name

This toner has been great for my acne and preventing more breakouts! My skin has cleared up because of this and it is not too harsh or damaging which is important because it has AHA. It has a perfect balance and a refreshing consistency.
Great for my acne!

name: Anti-Aging Vitamin Face Cream
prodHighlight: Formulated to help restore balance and hydration to the skin.
Perfect antioxidant solution for your daily skincare regimen.
Includes soothing Organic Aloe and beta carotene-rich Carrot Oil.
Scented with Orange Wild, Lavender and Geranium Essential Oils.
skinType: Suitable for all skin types, especially dry and mature.
warnings: For external use only. Do not ingest. Avoid contact with eyes. Flush eyes thoroughly with water if contact occurs. Keep out of reach of children. Discontinue use if signs of irritation or rash appear. Pregnant or lactating people or those with known medical conditions should consult with a physician prior to using product.
prodDesc: A light, comfortable cream packed with essential vitamins and potent antioxidants. Effective on all skin types. Relieves dryness and reduces skin sensitivity and fine lines. Vitamin A can be effective in boosting collagen fiber production in your skin, which can help you look younger. Soothes and nourishes skin with organic aloe and vitamins B5, C and E.
prodDirec: Moisturize your face and neck every morning and night, after you cleanse and tone. Always moisturize your face and neck in upward motions. Avoid direct contact with eyes. External use only.
prodIngr:
Water (Aqua), Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil*, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Elaeis Guineensis (Palm) Fruit Oil*, Stearic Acid, Polysorbate 60, Phenoxyethanol, Tocopherol, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice*, Rosa Damascena (Rose) Flower Water, Rosa Canina (Rosehip) Seed Oil , Daucus Carota (Carrot) Seed Oil, Orange Wild (Citrus Sinensis) Essential Oil*, Lavender (Lavandula Angustifolia) Essential Oil*, Geranium (Pelargonium Graveolens) Essential Oil*, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Oil, Retinyl Palmitate , Ascorbyl Palmitate, Panthenol, Allantoin, Melia Azadirachta (Neem) Seed Oil*, Rosmarinus officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract*, Salix Alba (White Willow) Bark Extract*, Xanthan Gum, Alcohol*, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Citric Acid. 
 *Organic

name: Avocado Cream Facial Cleanser
superIngr: Organic Coconut Oil and Organic Neem Seed Oil
prodHighlight: Jojoba Oil closely resembles the skin’s natural sebum composition, making it ideal to quickly absorb and nourish.
Loaded with antioxidants and vitamins, this cleanser contains Avocado Fruit Oil, Grapeseed Oil, and Organic Coconut and Jojoba Seed Oils.
A non-foaming cream-based cleanser that maintains healthy oils while achieving an excellent clean feeling.
Witch Hazel Distillate achieves a superior cleanse, while Organic White Willow Bark works to soothe and tone skin.
skinType: Suitable for all skin types, especially dry, mature, and sensitive.
warnings: For external use only. Do not ingest. Avoid contact with eyes. Flush eyes thoroughly with water if contact occurs. Keep out of reach of children. Discontinue use if signs of irritation or rash appear. Pregnant or lactating people or those with known medical conditions should consult with a physician prior to using product.
prodDesc: An ideal gentle and soothing cream cleanser, for everyday use. It is mild but washes away impurities while hydrating and nourishing the skin with antioxidants and vitamins. The aromas of Relaxation & Peace essential oil blend add therapeutic benefits to this first step of your daily skincare routine.
prodDirec: Apply a nickel size amount into hands and gently massage into damp skin in an upwards circular motion. Wash off with lukewarm water and dry with a soft towel. Can be used both day and night. External use only.
prodIngr: Organic Aloe Leaf Juice (Aloe Barbadensis), Avocado Fruit Oil (Persea Gratissima), Organic Coconut Oil (Cocos Nucifera), Emulsifying Wax (Cetyl Alcohol, Stearyl Alcohol, Polysorbate 60), Stearic Acid, Glycerin, Organic Jojoba Seed Oil (Simmondsia Chinensis), Grape Seed Oil (Vitis Vinifera), Witch Hazel Water (Hamamelis Virginiana), Vitamin E (Tocopherol), Sunflower Seed Oil (Helianthus Annuus), Organic Neem Seed Oil (Melia Azadirachta), Organic Rosemary Leaf Extract (Rosmarinus Officinalis), Organic Sunflower Seed Oil (Helianthus Annuus), Phenoxyethanol, Organic White Willow Bark Extract (Salix Alba), Lavendula Officinalis Oil (Lavender Essential Oil), Cananga Odorata Oil (Ylang Essential Oil), Salvia Lavandulafolia Oil (Sage Essential Oil), Citrus Paradisi (Pink Grapefruit Essential Oil), Cymbopogon Flexuosus (Lemongrass Essential Oil),Organic Alcohol, Xanthan Gum, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate

name: Blood Orange Resurface Scrub
superIngr: AHA bundle of Glycolic, Tartaric, Malic, Lactic, and Citric Acids
prodHighlight: For complete exfoliation that is gentle on your skin, this scrub uses very fine-grained Walnut Shell Powder to remove dead cells and reveal soft, smooth skin on your body.
Alpha Hydroxy Acids (AHAs) provide chemical exfoliation, helping cells refresh and look rejuvenated once the physical exfoliation is complete.
Organic Aloe Leaf Juice and Organic Jojoba Oil moisturize and nourish skin to maintain suppleness after exfoliation.
Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein helps to condition and soothe.
Rosehip Seed Oil and Walnut are loaded with antioxidants, helping skin both look and feel refreshed.
Suitable for use on the body (not more delicate facial skin) in gentle motions.
skinType: Suitable for all skin types, excluding sensitive.
warnings: Only to be used on the body, not the face. For external use only. Do not ingest. Keep out of reach of children. Discontinue use if signs of irritation or rash appear. Pregnant or lactating people or those with known medical conditions should consult with a physician prior to using product.
prodDesc: This gentle exfoliating treatment formulated with a powerful mixture of key ingredients like walnut shell powder, aloe, jojoba, willow bark, glycerin, vitamin E, and glycolic acid resurfaces and rejuvenates the skin for a beautiful glow.
prodDirec: Scoop between fingers, apply to wet skin to create a light foam and gently massage in a circular motion, focusing on rough areas. Rinse thoroughly and pat dry. Follow with light moisturizer if needed. Use 2-3 times weekly. Not recommended for the face.
prodIngr: Walnut Shell Powder (Juglans Regia), Organic Aloe Leaf Juice (Aloe Barbadensis), Decyl Glucoside, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Phenoxyethanol, Organic Lavender Flower Water (Lavandula Angustifolia), Roman Chamomile Flower Water (Anthemis Nobilis), Glycerin, Organic Jojoba Seed Oil (Simmondsia Chinensis), Rosehip Seed Oil (Rosa Canina), Organic Oatstraw Extract (Avena Sativa), Organic White Willow Bark Extract (Salix Alba), Glycolic Acid, Malic Acid, Tartaric Acid, Lactic Acid, Citric Acid, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Provitamin B5 (DL-Panthenol), Vitamin E (Tocopherol), Sunflower Seed Oil (Helianthus Annuus), Blood Orange Oil (Citrus Sinensis), Peppermint Oil (Mentha Piperita), Xanthan Gum, Organic Alcohol, Tetrasodium EDTA
reviews: Shay
I love the Blood Orange Body Scrub! It smells amazing and leaves my skin feeling soft and smooth. Highly recommend for weekly body exfoliation and helping prevent ingrown hairs.
Highly recommend this body scrub for exfloiating.

name: Café Gommage Mask
prodHighlight: “Gommage” [French for erase] has ability to remove dead skin and impurities without irritating the skin.
Coffee, Clove, Cayenne and Tea tree work together to stimulate at a cellular level increasing blood flow to your skin.
Lactic acid, Glycolic acid and Salicylic acid, pair up to dissolve dead skin and refine skin texture by improving the appearance of pores.
Kaolin has natural cleansing and purifying properties to support a clean and refreshed complexion.
skinType: Suitable for all skin types, but designed for maturing skin.
warnings: For external use only. Do not ingest. Avoid contact with eyes. Flush eyes thoroughly with water if contact occurs. Keep out of reach of children. Discontinue use if signs of irritation or rash appear. Pregnant or lactating people or those with known medical conditions should consult with a physician prior to using product.
prodDesc: This naturally nourishing facial mask containing Jojoba Oil and Squalene leaves skin feeling and looking soothed, smooth and supple. Caffeine works to brighten your appearance, improve circulation and decrease the appearance of wrinkles for a fresh and revived complexion.
prodDirec: On dry cleansed skin, apply a visible layer. Gently massage avoiding eye and mouth areas. Leave for 10 minutes and remove with a warm water. Follow with a gentle cleanser and moisturizer. Avoid direct sunlight for 24 hours. External use only.

name: Calming Lavender Facial Toner
superIngr: Lavender, Chamomile, and Tea Tree Essential Oils
prodHighlight: Formulated with both German and Roman Chamomile Essential Oils.
Includes Organic Aloe for a soothing boost, and the relaxing aroma of Lavender Essential Oil.
Contains cleansing Tea Tree Essential Oil to assist troubled complexions.
Relaxing and calming lavender & chamomile aroma make this excellent in a night routine or spa treatment.
Balances pH.
skinType: Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive and mature skin.
warnings: For external use only. Do not ingest. Avoid contact with eyes. Flush eyes thoroughly with water if contact occurs. Keep out of reach of children. Discontinue use if signs of irritation or rash appear. Pregnant or lactating people or those with known medical conditions should consult with a physician prior to using product.
prodDesc: This soothing, calming and balancing toner is specifically created for sensitive skin. Formulated with relaxing scent of Lavender and Chamomile, with supportive MSM, cleansing Tea Tree and clarifying Organic White Willow Bark, all in a gentle base of Organic Aloe.
prodDirec: After cleansing the face, apply a moderate amount of toner to a cotton pad and gently apply all over the face in upward motions (alternatively, close your eyes and spray directly on the face). Allow it to dry and follow with NuVitta Multivitamin Facial Serum or NuVitta Nourishing Night Cream for the best results. External use only.

name: Citrus Gel Facial Cleanser
prodHighlight: Excellent glide leaves skin silky-soft while allowing smaller portions per use.
Does quadruple duty: facial cleanser, shower gel, hand wash, or even bubble bath.
Organic Aloe and Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein help soothe and nourish skin during and after cleansing.
Pro-Vitamin B5 helps moisturize and rejuvenate.
Tea Tree Leaf Oil provides thorough cleansing to remove any impurities.
skinType: Suitable for all skin types.
warnings: For external use only. Do not ingest. Avoid contact with eyes. Flush eyes thoroughly with water if contact occurs. Keep out of reach of children. Discontinue use if signs of irritation or rash appear. Pregnant or lactating people or those with known medical conditions should consult with a physician prior to using product.
prodDesc: This clear facial gel cleanser will help soothe and nourish your skin during and after cleansing. Glides easily over the skin, leaving it silky-soft, richly conditioned, and pH balanced. Perfect for normal to combination skin types that want a foaming lather while nourishing skin.
prodDirec: Cleanse your face and neck every morning and night in circular motions in an upward direction. You do not need to use anything but your hands; washcloths are optional. External use only.

reviews: Need Name

This is the best cleanser I have used. The gel texture leaves my skin super hydrated and refreshed, not at all stripped like some other cleansers. It is light and great for summer, but also hydrating so it is perfect for winter as well. It is my favorite!
Leaves my skin refreshed. Favorite cleanser by far.

name: Cucumber Facial Toner
prodHighlight: Formulated to soothe and calm distressed or sensitive skin.,
Includes soothing Organic Aloe and crisp, refreshing Cucumber Distillate.
Contains cleansing Tea Tree Essential oil to assist troubled complexions.
Delightful and luxurious natural cucumber aroma.
skinType: Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive and mature skin.
warnings: For external use only. Do not ingest. Avoid contact with eyes. Flush eyes thoroughly with water if contact occurs. Keep out of reach of children. Discontinue use if signs of irritation or rash appear. Pregnant or lactating people or those with known medical conditions should consult with a physician prior to using product.

Made with the delicious scent of cucumber fruit water, organic aloe leaf juice and tea tree leaf oil to give your skin the perfect rejuvenating experience. You will fall in love with this product and it smells just like a fresh cut cucumber.

name: Daily Rose Booster
superIngr: Vitamins A, C, B3, B5, and E
prodHighlight: Formulated to provide a well balanced, and overall skin-supporting experience.
Includes toning DMAE and MSM.
Added Vitamin A (Retinol), Vitamin C (Ascorbic Acid), Vitamin B3 (Niacinamide), Provitamin B5 (DL-Panthenol), and Vitamin E (Tocopherol).
Super silky and soft texture and finish.
Engaging and light natural aroma.
skinType: Suitable for all skin types.
warnings: For external use only. Do not ingest. Avoid contact with eyes. Flush eyes thoroughly with water if contact occurs. Keep out of reach of children. Discontinue use if signs of irritation or rash appear. Pregnant or lactating people or those with known medical conditions should consult with a physician prior to using product.
prodDesc: A lightweight and fast-absorbing silky serum formulated for all skin types, featuring fast-absorbing Rosehip Oil and antioxidant-rich Hibiscus Extract. Rosehip contains powerful and effective Omega-3 & 6 fatty acids, Vitamin C, Gamma Linoleic Acid, and other essential fatty acids, while hibiscus is rich in antioxidants and has long been used as a natural astringent. This serum will leave skin looking rejuvenated and bright.

superIngr: Organic White Willow Bark, Rosemary, and Neem Extracts
prodHighlight: Formulated to help restore balance and moisture to the skin.
Perfect antioxidant and toning solution for any skincare regimen, especially for mature skin.
Contains Organic Jojoba Oil, which virtually mirrors the skin's own natural oils.
Includes toning Vegan DMAE, which can help improve the appearance of chaotic and maturing skin.
Added moisture-boosting OptiMSM.
Scented with Orange Wild, Lavender and Geranium Essential Oils.
skinType: Suitable for all skin types.
warnings: For external use only. Do not ingest. Avoid contact with eyes. Flush eyes thoroughly with water if contact occurs. Keep out of reach of children. Discontinue use if signs of irritation or rash appear. Pregnant or lactating people or those with known medical conditions should consult with a physician prior to using product. Although suitable for most skin types, DMAE can cause a tingling sensation so a patch test is recommended for those with sensitive skin.

Offers an intense hydration with organic coconut, jojoba oil, meadowfoam seed oil, and avocado oil. The vegan minerals DMAE and Opti MSM™ help firm and revive skin tone and texture.

Boost hydration and leave your eye area firmer
Soothe and protect
Improve elasticity
Restores radiance and glow
skinType: An effective choice for combination, oily, mature skin types – or anyone noticing deeper wrinkles.

Contact of the product with the skin must be of limited frequency and duration In the beginning.

External use only.

name: Hyaluronic Acid Serum
prodHighlight: Plant Stem Cell technology powers this product to rebuild elasticity, retain hydration, and promote healthy collagen production.
Glycolic Acid acts as a chemical exfoliant by loosening the bonds between dead skin cells while helping to treat acne.
Hyaluronic Acid and Jojoba Oil provide moisture.
Vitamin E seals in moisture, smooths skin, antioxidant.

warnings: For external use only. Do not ingest. Avoid contact with eyes. Flush eyes thoroughly with water if contact occurs. Keep out of reach of children. Discontinue use if signs of irritation or rash appear. Pregnant or lactating people or those with known medical conditions should consult with a physician prior to using product.
prodDesc: Hyaluronic Acid is known for its restorative benefits for aging skin, and it is one of our most effective moisturizing agents. Applied daily, increases hydration, improves elasticity and helps reverse free radical damage. This highly concentrated formula helps restore the skin’s own natural hyaluronic acid content and gives skin a younger, fresher, more supple look and a firmer, brighter complexion.

name: Makeup CLeansing Oil
prodHighlight: Loaded with antioxidants and vitamins, this oil cleanser contains Grapeseed Oil, Organic Sunflower Oil, Rice Bran Oil, Pumpkin Seed Oil, and Avocado Oil.
Wipes away makeup and cleans without stripping the skin of its natural oils.
Delivers antioxidants and protects from free radical damage.
Brightens complexion and evens out skin tone.
Promotes scar and wound healing.
skinType: Suitable for all skin types, including dry, normal, oily, and even acne-prone skin.
warnings: For external use only. Do not ingest. Avoid contact with eyes. Flush eyes thoroughly with water if contact occurs. Keep out of reach of children. Discontinue use if signs of irritation or rash appear. Pregnant or lactating people or those with known medical conditions should consult with a physician prior to using product.

prodDirec: Apply a dime sized amount to a cotton round and gently wipe away mascara and makeup debris. This can be done before or after cleansing the face and when the skin is either wet or dry. When makeup is emulsified, rinse with warm water or finish with an additional cleanse.

name: 10% Niacinamide Serum
prodHighlight: Niacinamide helps skin tone appear even, glowing, and bright.
Zinc PCA soothes distressed and blemish-prone skin, and helps control excess shine for oily skin types.
Hyaluronic acid and glycerin add a humectant boost, drawing moisture from the environment for all-day hydration.
Aloe Vera helps calm and soothe distressed skin while giving this serum a cooling, lightweight gel texture.
skinType: Suitable for all skin types, but geared toward oily or blemish-pro skin.
warnings: For external use only. Do not ingest. Patch testing prior to use is advised. Avoid contact with eyes. Flush eyes thoroughly with water if contact occurs. Keep out of reach of children. Discontinue use if signs of irritation or rash appear. Pregnant or lactating people or those with known medical conditions should consult with a physician prior to using product.
prodDesc: Brighten, balance, and hydrate skin with Niacinamide Serum 10% formula. Boosted niacinamide content works to reduce the appearance of uneven or dull skin tone, while zinc PCA helps soothe troubled skin and regulate excess oil and shine. Glycerin, hyaluronic acid, and aloe vera combine to give this serum a soothing, hydrating twist, supporting the skin’s barrier and setting this serum apart from similar ones on the market.
prodDirec: Apply 1 – 2 drops/pumps of serum to clean, dry skin and gently massage into skin. Allow a few minutes to fully absorb into skin before applying additional products. Can be used morning or night. Most effective when applied to freshly cleansed skin, and before the application of heavier products like creams or moisturizers. For external use only.

name: Retinol 2.5% Cream

Leaves your skin looking younger, firmer and healthier.
Brightens skin and improve discolorations.
Saturates deeply and keeps skin feeling hydrated and smooth.

skinType: Suitable for all skin types.
warnings:
For external use only. Do not ingest. Avoid contact with eyes. Flush eyes thoroughly with water if contact occurs. Keep out of reach of children. Discontinue use if signs of irritation or rash appear. Pregnant or lactating people or those with known medical conditions should consult with a physician prior to using product. 
 Avoid this product if you are allergic or sensitive to any of the ingredients in this product. Do not apply to broken or irritated skin or areas affected by rashes. It is recommended that prior to exposure to the sun, users cover areas where Retinol has been applied with sunscreen. Contact of the product with the skin must be of limited frequency and duration.

Complementing this is the powerful hydrating action of Hyaluronic Acid, Jojoba Oil and Shea Butter, resulting in younger looking skin.
prodDirec: Apply in a light circular motion to freshly cleansed and toned face, neck and décolleté areas avoiding direct contact with eyes. Moisturizer application should follow serum application, if used. Allow time to absorb prior to makeup application. Recommended for use at night. Always use SPF when sun exposure is expected. External use only.

Dose skin with our favorite array of fatty acids from Chia Seed and Camellia Seed Oils
Moisturize and tone skin with Organic Jojoba Oil and Daikon Seed Extract
Jasmine Grandiflorum Absolute and Rose Absolute create an enticing and luxurious scent
Suitable as a facial serum, body oil, or taming hair oil and ideal for premium-focused lines
skinType: Suitable for all skin types, but designed for maturing skin.
warnings: For external use only. Do not ingest. Avoid contact with eyes. Flush eyes thoroughly with water if contact occurs. Keep out of reach of children. Discontinue use if signs of irritation or rash appear. Pregnant or lactating people or those with known medical conditions should consult with a physician prior to using product.
prodDesc: A nourishing face oil that helps improve and hydrate the skin. Premium ingredients are combined with delicate jasmine and rose scents for a luxurious oil designed to give high doses of antioxidants, fatty acids, and hydration.
prodDirec: Apply a small amount to clean damp skin as needed and massage into skin until absorbed. Can also be used on hair and as a night oil. External use only.
prodIngr:
Jojoba (Simmondsia chinensis) Oil, Daikon (Raphanus) Seed Extract, * Chia (Salvia hispanica) Seed Oil, * Camellia (Camellia oleifera) Oil, Tomato (Solanum lycopersicum) Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cranberry (Vaccinium macrocarpon) Oil, Sunflower (Helianthus annuus) Oil, * Seabuckthorn (Hippophae rhamnoides) Berry, Jasmine Grandiflorum (Jasminum grandiflorum) Absolute, Rose (Rosa damascena) Absolute, Coenzyme Q10 (Ubidecarenone), Vitamin E (Tocopherol) Oil 
 *Certified Organic Ingredients
reviews: Need Name

This face oil leaves my skin so supple and hydrated. I can noticeably see improvement in my skin the morning after I put it on compared to when I don’t! It is my favorite oil, and it is always my go-to every night! It is not too heavy and thick like most oils, but instead is a perfect balance of lightness, making it great for oily skin types as well as dry.
My go-to face oil I put on every night
